languages.text: "Пусть Толкователь служит династии фон Валанциус столь же верно, как до того служил аколитам Святого Ордоса".

traits.locale_text: "Пусть Толкователь служит династии фон Валанциус столь же верно, как до того служил аколитам Святого Ордоса".
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "May the Elucidator serve House von Valancius as faithfully as it has served the acolytes of the Holy Ordos up to now."
languages.original_text: "Пусть Толкователь служит династии фон Валанциус столь же верно, как до того служил аколитам Святого Ордоса".

traits.locale_text: "May the Elucidator serve House von Valancius as faithfully as it has served the acolytes of the Holy Ordos up to now."

traits.locale_text: "May the Elucidator serve House von Valancius as faithfully as it has served the acolytes of the Holy Ordos up to now."

languages.text: “这台阐释器曾为审判庭的众多侍仆服务过，愿它能以同等的忠诚为冯·瓦兰修斯家族服务。”
languages.original_text: "May the Elucidator serve House von Valancius as faithfully as it has served the acolytes of the Holy Ordos up to now."

traits.locale_text: “这台阐释器曾为审判庭的众多侍仆服务过，愿它能以同等的忠诚为冯·瓦兰修斯家族服务。”
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: «Espero que el Dilucidador sirva a la casa von Valancius con la misma eficacia con la que ha servido a los acólitos de los Santos Ordos hasta ahora».
languages.original_text: "May the Elucidator serve House von Valancius as faithfully as it has served the acolytes of the Holy Ordos up to now."

traits.locale_text: «Espero que el Dilucidador sirva a la casa von Valancius con la misma eficacia con la que ha servido a los acólitos de los Santos Ordos hasta ahora».
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: 「エルシデイターがフォン・ヴァランシウス家に、これまで聖なる宗団のアコライトたちに仕えてきたように、忠実に仕えますように」
languages.original_text: "May the Elucidator serve House von Valancius as faithfully as it has served the acolytes of the Holy Ordos up to now."

traits.locale_text: 「エルシデイターがフォン・ヴァランシウス家に、これまで聖なる宗団のアコライトたちに仕えてきたように、忠実に仕えますように」
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: « Que l'élucidateur serve la maison von Valancius aussi fidèlement qu'il a servi les acolytes du Saint Ordo jusqu'à présent. »
languages.original_text: "May the Elucidator serve House von Valancius as faithfully as it has served the acolytes of the Holy Ordos up to now."

traits.locale_text: « Que l'élucidateur serve la maison von Valancius aussi fidèlement qu'il a servi les acolytes du Saint Ordo jusqu'à présent. »
traits.speaker: HeinrixCompanion

languages.text: "Möge der Elucidator dem Haus von Valancius treu dienen, so wie er bisher den Akolythen der Heiligen Ordos gedient hat."
languages.original_text: "May the Elucidator serve House von Valancius as faithfully as it has served the acolytes of the Holy Ordos up to now."

traits.locale_text: "Möge der Elucidator dem Haus von Valancius treu dienen, so wie er bisher den Akolythen der Heiligen Ordos gedient hat."

languages.original_text: "May the Elucidator serve House von Valancius as faithfully as it has served the acolytes of the Holy Ordos up to now."

languages.text: "Aydınlatıcı, bugüne dek Kutsal Nizam havarilerine ettiği gibi von Valancius Hanesi'ne de sadakatle hizmet etsin."
languages.original_text: "May the Elucidator serve House von Valancius as faithfully as it has served the acolytes of the Holy Ordos up to now."
